data.database_description: The database is designed to manage various aspects of drama workshops and related services, including client information, workshop groups, performers, customer orders, products, services, bookings, invoices, and payment methods. It tracks relationships between these entities through foreign key constraints, ensuring data integrity across the system. The schema supports operations such as managing customer and performer details, scheduling workshops, processing orders, generating invoices, and handling payments, providing a comprehensive framework for organizing drama-related activities and transactions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each payment method.
Description of the payment method.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: References payment methods available for transactions, including their descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each service type.
Foreign key linking to the parent service type.
Description of the service type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: References different types of services offered, including descriptions and parent service type relationships.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for an address.
First line of the address.
Second line of the address, if applicable.
The city or town part of the address.
The state or county part of the address.
Additional details about the address, if any.

sample_data: 124, 391 Vandervort Fall Apt. 446, Apt. 107, West Sherwoodstad, Indiana
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores address details for various entities in the drama workshop system.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each product.
The name of the product.
The price of the product.
A brief description of the product.
Additional details about the product or service.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about products available for sale.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each marketing region.
Name of the marketing region.
Description of the marketing region.
Additional details about the marketing region.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about different marketing regions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each client.
Identifier linking the client to an address.
Email address of the client.
Name of the client.
Phone number of the client.
Additional information about the client.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about clients who participate in drama workshops.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each drama workshop group.
Foreign key linking to the Addresses table to store address information.
Code representing the currency used by the workshop group.
Code indicating the marketing region for the workshop group.
Name of the store associated with the drama workshop group.
Phone number for the store.
Email address for the store.
Additional details about the workshop group.

140, 180, USD, DE, Veda Film, 793-966-9311x5303, breitenberg.veda@example.com, Bad
176, 286, EU, RU, Queen Art, 492-463-5967, quigley.queen@example.org, Good
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about drama workshop groups, including contact details and other relevant data.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for a performer.
Foreign key linking to the Addresses table to store the performer's address.
Name of the performer.
Phone number of the performer.
Email address of the performer.
Additional details about the performer, if any.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about performers participating in drama workshops.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each customer.
Identifier linking the customer to an address.
Name of the customer.
Phone number of the customer.
Email address of the customer.
Additional information about the customer.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Contains customer details such as contact information and other relevant data.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each store.
Foreign key linking to the Addresses table, representing the store's address.
Foreign key linking to the Marketing_Regions table, indicating the marketing region of the store.
Name of the store.
Phone number of the store.
Email address of the store.
Additional details about the store.
Unique identifier for each booking.
Identifier linking the booking to a specific client.
Identifier for the workshop group booked.
Current status of the booking.
Identifier for the store where the booking was made.
Date and time when the booking was placed.
Scheduled date for delivering the workshop.
Date when the workshop actually took place.
Additional details about the booking.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records information about customer bookings for drama workshops.

columns.columnDescription: Identifier linking to a booking.
Identifier of the performer involved in the booking.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Links performers to specific bookings for drama workshops.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each order.
Identifier linking the order to a specific customer.
Identifier linking the order to a specific store.
Date when the order was placed.
Scheduled delivery date for the order.
Date when the order was actually delivered.
Additional information about the order.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records details of customer orders, including order dates and delivery information.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each item in an order.
Identifier linking the order item to a specific customer order.
Identifier linking the order item to a specific product.
The quantity of the product ordered.
Additional details about the order item.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores details of items included in customer orders.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each invoice.
Reference to the order associated with the invoice.
Code representing the payment method used for the invoice.
Identifier for the product included in the invoice.
Quantity of the product ordered.
Additional details about the items in the order.
Unique identifier for each item within an order.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about invoices generated for drama workshop orders.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each service.
Foreign key linking to the type of service.
Foreign key linking to the drama workshop group offering the service.
Description of the product or service.
Name of the product or service.
Price of the product or service.
Additional details about the product or service.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores details about individual services, including pricing and associated workshop groups.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for an order, linking to the Bookings table.
Unique identifier for a service product, linking to the Services table.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks the services associated with each order in bookings.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for an invoice item.
Unique identifier for an invoice, linking to the Invoices table.
Unique identifier for an order, linking to the Bookings_Services table.
Unique identifier for an item within an order, linking to the Order_Items table.
Unique identifier for a product associated with the order item.
Quantity of the product ordered.
Additional details about the invoice item.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records individual items included in an invoice, detailing each order item and its associated product.
